main event: A retired Air Force pilot reported seeing a low-flying, elongated object estimated to be traveling at about 1500 mph near Rivesville, West Virginia.
interesting points: The object was observed moving rapidly without making any sound., The object was described as having no wings and lights around its outer edges., The sighting lasted for approximately 30 minutes., Witnesses reported seeing a brilliant white light and three smaller yellow lights at the rear during a different sighting in the area., A sheriff in Rockingham County warned against disbelievers carrying firearms due to numerous reports of flying saucers.
